name: coin-case
effect: Contains the Coins used by the Game Corner, to a maximum of 50,000.
short_effect: Holds coins for the Game Corner.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It can hold up to 50,000 coins.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It can hold up to 50,000 coins.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It can hold up to 50,000 coins.
